description: This file defines a React functional component 'EmptyState' that renders a styled, friendly message for when there is no data to display, including optional title, description, and an action element.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title = "No results", description = "Try adjusting your search or refresh to see the latest items.", action = null, })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a styled empty state message with optional title, description, and action.
